FLEX-DIVIDER

[acss-row][acss-divider-x="1"][acss-divider-color="black"][acss-gap-x="0"]

acss-divider use :before, :after pseduo element to display divider line.

[acss-row][acss-divider-x="1 around"][acss-divider-color="black"][acss-gap-x="0"]

If you set acss-divider around, you should add padding value as half gap value
